titles.title: Hammers' Law
Hammers' Law
A bill to provide authorization for nonpecuniary damages in an action resulting from a cruise ship voyage occurring on the high seas.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Hammers' Law
This bill makes additional compensation recoverable for nonpecuniary damages (but not punitive damages) for deaths resulting from a passenger cruise ship voyage accident occurring on the high seas beyond 12 nautical miles from the U.S. shore.
